email.description: The email address of the user involved in the transaction.

index.description: A numeric index associated with the transaction.

price.description: A string representing the price of the product, including a currency code followed by the amount.

product_url.description: A URL that points to the product involved in the transaction.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the transaction occurred, formatted in ISO 8601.

user_id.description: A numeric identifier for the user.
